title: Track Transaction Contingency Deadline
description: A property is under contract, and the 10-day inspection contingency period is about to expire. The agent must remind the buyer's agent.

tasks.description: Identify the transaction and its key dates from the transaction management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the property and the upcoming contingency removal deadline.

tasks.description: Verify that the buyer has not yet submitted the contingency removal form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the form is still outstanding.

tasks.description: Send a reminder email to the buyer's agent about the deadline in 2 days.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a professional and timely reminder.
